title: Identifying Common Denominator
text: The fractions have a common denominator, so subtract the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator.

title: Factoring the Numerator
text: The numerator can be factored to produce $$\left(5b+6\right) \left(5b-6\right)$$

title: Simplifying Fraction
text: After replacing the factored parts, what is the simplified form of the fraction?
